word_mean: 肾上腺切除术：切除一侧或两侧肾上腺

sentence.Network_en: Both of them received adrenalectomy to relieve symptoms and the pathologic results showed adrenal myelolipoma.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们两者均接受肾上腺切除手术,病理报告显示为肾上腺骨髓脂肪瘤.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To evaluate the indications, technic and clinical efficacy of transperitoneal laparoscopic adrenalectomy for adrenal diseases.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的探讨腹腔镜下经腹腔径路肾上腺切除术治疗肾上腺疾病的适应证 、 手术技巧及优缺点.

sentence.Network_en: To study the main points of nursing in laparoscopic adrenalectomy with different operational route.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究腹腔镜不同手术径路肾上腺切除的护理要点.
